description: Unique identifier for this work order comment record.
Reference to the maintenance work order this comment pertains to.
System timestamp when the comment was first created.
Username of the staff member who created the comment.
Coded flag for whether/where the note appears on printed documents; nonzero values denote destinations; confirm mapping with SME.
Coded options controlling if/how the note is copied to related records (e.g., estimates, invoices, history); confirm mapping with SME.
Free‑text note content attached to the work order.
Username of the user who last edited the comment.
System-maintained timestamp of the last change; may be unused in this dataset.
Timestamp of the most recent user‑initiated update to this comment.
Identifier of the current application user who created the record (audit).
Timestamp when the current application created this record.
Identifier of the current application user who last modified the record.
Timestamp when the current application last modified this record.
